snippet.title: Amber Heard Reacts To Losing All Her Movie Roles!
snippet.description:
This Is What Amber Heard Had To Say After She Found Out She Was Losing All Her Big Roles In Upcoming Movies!

In the Hollywood world, everyone wants to get that big role that will forever put you in the spotlight, usually getting one of those means that you will keep getting the same type of roles and stay as an A-list actor or actress proving time and time again how you can cover a variety of important roles. For Amber Heard this moment happened when she got her dream role as Mera in Aquaman but it seems she won’t be able to carry on the momentum and get more jobs in the business. At least not in the mainstream one, currently she is filming an Indie film which isn’t helping her career in the slightest but if you are at rock bottom, you have to work with what you get. 

✅ Subscribe & HIT that notification bell for more Celebrity Content!

The reason for losing all her roles is as we know the infamous case against Johnny Depp. Recently, though, the suit has only been getting worse for her as she was outed for lying and cheating her way in life. As she also tried in court and in the whole lawsuit against Johnny Depp. But how exactly did she react to finding out she lost everything she has worked for in just a split second?

#AmberHeard #JohnnyDepp
